title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When creating a report parameter and setting the Display type to List Box, the default value is set to 'aa'.
EB: After modifying the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa' in the Edit Parameter dialog and clicking OK, the default value should be 'aaa' when reopening the dialog.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
